subject: Your forgot password request
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Forgot your password? No worriesâ€”we've got you covered! Just click the link below to reset your password and get back to using Weam in no time.

 
Reset Password
 

For security reasons, this link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this emailâ€”your account is still secure.

{{footer}}

subject: custom ai signup request
body:
{{header}}

Hi {{name}},

Here is your custom ai Portal account password.

Please use this {{password}} password to login.

Cheers,

subject: You're Invited to Join Weam!
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

{{name}} has invited you to join your team on Weam, the ultimate AI-powered collaboration platform!

Weam makes it easy for teams to work together, create custom AI bots, share prompts, and streamline productivityâ€”all in one place.

To get started, just accept your invitation here:

Accept Invitation
 

Once you sign up, you'll get access to your team's Shared Brain where you can collaborate with the team, save prompts, and explore ready-to-use AI tools. You'll also have your own Private Brain for personal work.

{{footer}}

subject: Request for Additional Storage
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{company_admin_name}},

Heads up! {{username}} has run out of document storage on their Weam account and is requesting more space to upload additional documents.

To ensure they can continue collaborating smoothly with the team, you may want to review the storage allocation or upgrade your team's plan.

{{footer}}

subject: Your Password Has Been Reset
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Your password has been reset successfully! ðŸŽ‰ You're all set to log in and continue using Weam.

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Weam!
body:
{{header}}

Hey {{name}},

Welcome to Weam! ðŸŽ‰ We're excited to have you on board as you begin your journey toward seamless AI collaboration for your team.

You're all set with a 30-day free trial to explore everything Weam has to offerâ€”no strings attached. Start leveraging powerful agents and curated prompts to boost your teamâ€™s productivity today.

Here's a quick guide to help you get started:

You can even import your existing chats from ChatGPT or Anthropicâ€”no need to worry about losing your past work.

1. Explore Your Shared Brain:
Each team has a Shared Brain where you can save prompts, create custom AI bots, and collaborate with your team in real-time. It's all organized in one place so everyone stays on the same page.

2. Connect with Agents & Prompts:
Build and use powerful AI agents tailored to your workflows, and tap into a growing library of curated prompts to save time and stay efficient.

3. Ready-to-Use Templates:
Get a head start! Check out our library of pre-built prompt and bot templates designed to help your team boost productivity instantly.

4. Private Brain (Just for You!):
You also have a Private Brainâ€”a space to store your personal prompts and bots, separate from the team's workspace.

To dive right in, log into your dashboard:

{{footer}}

subject: Requesting more users
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

We are so glad you want to share Weam with everyone on your team.

Our support team will reach out to you via email in the next 24 hours to understand your user requirements and process your request.

Weam is evolving as we speak. Soon this process will be so much simpler. We truly appreciate your patience.

{{footer}}

subject: Requesting more users
body:
{{header}}

Hey,

The following account is requesting to add more users, please reach out to them in the next 24 hours.

{{footer}}

subject: Welcome to Weam! Verify Your Account
body:
{{header}}

Hi there!

Welcome to Weam, your all-in-one AI adaptation platform for teams! We're excited to have you on board.

With Weam, you can collaborate seamlessly with your team, chat with AI, save prompts, and create custom botsâ€”all within a shared or private space. Access multiple generative AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Llama without separate subscriptions, and track your team's AI adoption for smooth onboarding.

To get started, please verify your account by clicking the button below. This link will expire in 60 minutes.

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Weam Team

{{footer}}

subject: Verify Your Account â€“ Resend Verification Link
body:
{{header}}

We noticed that you requested to resend your email verification link. To complete the registration process and activate your account, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:

Verify Your Account
 
 

If you're having trouble with the button, click here for support

Happy collaborating!

Best,

The Weam Team

{{footer}}

You now have an extra {{storageSize}} MB of storage added to your account. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.

Thank you for being a valued member of the Weam community!
